note: Add EM when playing Vaporize. Whimsy > Gladiator, but if you have great pieces, the latter can be valid. Reverie only works in burn teams but there can be as good as whimsy (and can be farmed together)
do not farm Maiden Beloved only for Barbara

Song of Days past is a valid alternative when someone else on the team is already using noblesse and is best used by a C6 Chevreuse. Burst is irrelevant to her buff, so the player can choose to not include it in their rotation.
Emblem is the best option for Chev's personal damage, however, Golden Troupe can also work for a C4+ when she uses all 3 skill charges
do not run triple DEF%, husk preferable at C6
Flower is technically the better set but by such a small margin that it does not justify farming it
HP become a relevant stat from C1 onwards, Vourokasha becomes equal or better at C4 or higher
Battery = Energy Generator for others (in this case with skill), Emblem does this best while noblesse (worse) is for buffing with burst
prioritize ER over main stats
prioritize ER over main stats

artifact_set: Scroll of the Hero of Cinder City

note: Reverie can only do burning reactions, whereas obsidian can also do burgeon
Flower is better, but gilded dreams is easier to farm because you need Deepwood for the team anyway
prioritize ER substats, with enough ER, Mona can gain enough  Hydro DMG Bonus to the point where ATK Goblet is better
do not farm heart of depth, only use it if you already have it
Generalist set for personal damage and dendro reactions. Only one per party needed, nahida is the best holder.
Maximizes Nahida's personal damage, preferable when she is the only dendro in party. Gilded not recommended if Nahida doesnt trigger many reactions
Potential Best-in-Slot if the team has ATK-scaling characters who deal significantly more damage than Nahida (e.g., Yae Miko, Fischl)

artifact_set: Nighttime Whispers in the Echoing Woods

note: with Furina
if you have weapon, ER always better than attack
Flower of Paradise lost gives more damage but Gilded dreams is easier to farm if you nee deepwood memories for your dendro support
Clam increases Kokomi's personal damage and is good for on-field during her burst, milelith buffs the rest of the party and is good for an off-field Kokomi
build for pure shielding, needs to get burst up to shield
do not farm shimenawa, only use if if you dont wanna farm pavilion and have it lying around
Emblem is the best set, the others are worse alternatives that are still valid if you have them lying around
